alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 2:25PM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Chenango, Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates are expected Sunday night into early Monday morning. The highest snowfall totals are expect to occur over the highest elevations. Blowing snow is also possible on Monday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
